mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `name`, `component_id` AS componentId, `username`, `password`, `config`, `is_active` AS isActive, `token`, DATE_FORMAT(expire, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS expire, `description`, `authtype`, `type` FROM `api` WHERE component_id = #{value}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `component_id` AS componentId, `username`, `password`, `config`, `is_active` AS isActive, `token`, DATE_FORMAT(expire, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS expire, `description`, `authtype`, `type`, `need_audit` AS needAudit FROM `api` WHERE token = #{value}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO `api_component` (id, name, config, module) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{config}, #{module})

select LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
INSERT INTO `api` ( name, `is_active`, `component_id`, `config`, `token`, `description`, `expire`, `username`, `password`, `authtype`, `type`, `qps`, `need_audit` ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{isActive}, #{componentId}, #{config}, #{token}, #{description}, #{expire}, #{username}, #{password}, #{authtype}, #{type}, #{qps}, #{needAudit} )
